team_gold_zork

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • team_gold_zork.Event

  • class Event
extends java.lang.Object
    This class deals with events that are triggered by commands, which are related to specific objects or characters. Then executes the appropriate methods to reflect those consequences

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Event(java.lang.String event, Item item)
      Constructs an Event object related to ItemSpecificCommands

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void die()
      The method modifies the players health to the point of the player not being able to function and essentially kills the player
      (package private) void execute(java.lang.String events)
      This method will take in a string of Events obtained from the constructor, parses them for meaning, and performs the appropriate methods.
      (package private) void score(int pointValue)
      Modifies the players score depending on the point value of Score event
      (package private) void teleport()
      This method will actually change the adventurer's current room
      (package private) void transform(java.lang.String newItemName)
      This method allows an item to disappear and be replaced with an item of the given name
      (package private) void win()
      This method will modify the player state (probably by changing some boolean variable if all the requirements for winning the game are met) for winning the game have been met
      (package private) void wound(int pointValue)
      This method modifies the players health depending on the point value of the wound event/action

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Event

        Event(java.lang.String event,
      Item item)
        Constructs an Event object related to ItemSpecificCommands
        Parameters:
        event - describes the result/consequence of a command related to an Item.
        item - the Item which was involved in triggering the event.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        void execute(java.lang.String events)
        This method will take in a string of Events obtained from the constructor, parses them for meaning, and performs the appropriate methods.
        Parameters:
        events - the string of events obtained form the constructor

      • score

        void score(int pointValue)
        Modifies the players score depending on the point value of Score event
        Parameters:
        pointValue - the amount of points to add to the player's score.

      • wound

        void wound(int pointValue)
        This method modifies the players health depending on the point value of the wound event/action
        Parameters:
        pointValue - the amount of points to deduct from the player's health.

      • die

        void die()
        The method modifies the players health to the point of the player not being able to function and essentially kills the player

      • win

        void win()
        This method will modify the player state (probably by changing some boolean variable if all the requirements for winning the game are met) for winning the game have been met

      • transform

        void transform(java.lang.String newItemName)
        This method allows an item to disappear and be replaced with an item of the given name
        Parameters:
        newItemName - the name of the new existing item that replaced the old item

      • teleport

        void teleport()
        This method will actually change the adventurer's current room
